title: Run tourist WTP intercept test on Bahnhofstrasse â€” 20 tourists, 60-second demo, count willingness to pay CHF 4.99/month
description: Council requirement #1. Book a morning on Bahnhofstrasse. Prepare a rough Wizard of Oz demo. Intercept 20 tourists. Show the experience. Ask them to pay. Target: 12+ yeses. Film reactions.
